name: OralContraceptivePillSNOMEDProvisionProcedures
title: Oral Contraceptive Pill SNOMED Provision Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family planning - provision of most and moderately effective contraceptive methods),(Data Element Scope: Procedure codes indicating prescription or provision of an oral contraceptive pill, a moderately effective method of contraception),(Inclusion Criteria: Procedure codes indicating prescription or provision of an oral contraceptive pill, a moderately effective method of contraception),(Exclusion Criteria: Contraceptive methods that are not an oral pill; Most effective (i.e., sterilization, contraceptive implants, intrauterine devices or systems) or moderately effective (i.e., injectables, contraceptive patch or contraceptive ring) methods of contraception; Less effective methods of contraception (i.e., diaphragm, male condom, female condom, withdrawal, sponge, fertility-awareness based methods, spermicide); excludes oral pills for emergency contraception and hormone replacement therapy)
